entry.title: RAINFALL WARNING , Hart Island
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:03 PM AST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 3.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Hart Island 03:00 AM AST Monday 16 January 2023
Temperature: 3.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.3 kPa falling
Humidity: 96 %
Dewpoint: 2.8°C
Wind: NE 41 km/h gust 57 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday night: Rain. Temperature rising to plus 5 by morning.
entry.summary: Rain. Risk of freezing rain early this evening. Rainfall amount 15 mm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 except gusting to 70 along parts of the coast. Temperature rising to plus 5 by morning. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Rain. High 10.
entry.summary: Rain. Fog patches developing in the morning. Amount 15 to 25 mm. Wind east 40 km/h gusting to 70. High 10. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: A few showers. Low 9.
entry.summary: Showers. Amount 2 to 4 mm. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming east 50 gusting to 80 overnight. Low 9. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.summary: Showers. High 8. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Sunday 15 January 2023
